name: Delia: The Traveling Witch
description:
Delia and her Glowing Pig Bao are now in Glutinous Kingdom. After receiving a request to cure a sick child, they are wrapped in an adventure that spans the whole magical land!

Delia: The Traveling Witch is an Action Platformer with lots of talking NPC's and locations to learn about. It will eventually have elements of Schmup gameplay as well.

This game is being built over the course of 10 weeks and has an expected finish date in Early April. It is being built within GBStudio, and through a solo game developer, Kaimatten.

Currently the game is V.1 - there is only 1 level: somewhere between 5-10 minutes of content. It can be played in Browser or by downloading the Rom, however there are some color issues between the two.

The game is made to be built for a Gameboy, and thus has all the limitations of a Gameboy Color. Expect to experience 90's finicky-ness.

CONTROLS:
Z = Jump/Interact

X = Shoot/Cancel

ENTER = Pause

Game updates will be in Devlog and occasionally on Twitter @Kaimatten
